title: iHome Zenergy
description:
Sleep Restfully. Wake Energized 

About Zenergy
A shocking 2 out of 3 Americans are struggling with sleep at least once per week. This struggle can leave you
feeling tired and unhappy, but it can also contribute to being unhealthy. Achieving adequate amounts of restful
sleep is just as essential as diet and exercise to the healthy functioning of the human body and mind.
Proper sleep can:
- strengthen the immune system - improve memory and alertness
- help to support a healthy weight - reduce depression and anxiety
There are many factors that can contribute to a decreased amount or quality of sleep; iHome Zenergy strives to
alleviate some of these factors by utilizing a combination of scientifically proven light therapy and sound therapy.

Create a calming environment for sleep or an energizing atmosphere for waking with this engaging combination of light and sound therapy.features sound therapy tracks designed to calm your mind, lower your breathing and heart rate, and prepare your body for sleep. You can also select full-color light therapy and decor lighting modes to align your circadian rhythm at night and  to improve your energy levels and mood when you wake up.   Bluetooth wireless audio streaming from your mobile device.

transcripts: Distracting noises, racing minds, and a life full of phones and computers can make it difficult to sleep at night and focus during the day. In fact, two out of three Americans suffer from a lack of quality sleep. If you're tired of waking up on the wrong side of the bed, relax you mind and body with the Zenergy collection with iHome. These bluetooth speakers are designed with light and sound therapy to realign your circadian rhythm to your sleep and wake schedule. Choose between therapeutic sounds of white, digital recordings of natural environments or engineer tones that mimic meditative brainwaves to experience a more focused and peaceful state of mind. Zenergy light therapy uses soothing red and orange tone hues to increase melatonin and encourage sleep at night while stimulating blue toned and multicolored themes help you wake up and stay energized throughout the day. The Zynergy line is endorsed by Dr. Michael Bruce. Throughout the day, your body is exposed to different wavelengths of light that help maintain your natural sleep wake schedule, but if you have a busy day, you can actually deprive yourself of this event. The Zynergy collection simulates these light wavelengths with soothing sounds to trigger subtle biological responses that can improve your overall sleep, energy, and mood. I'm going to recommending this to my family to my friends and especially to my patients. With multiple light and therapy modes, the Zynergy collection is for all ages and features models for both home and travel. Plus, use the convenient Zynergy app to customize your settings and daily schedules. Get the good night sleep you deserve with the Zynergy collection from iHome. Sleep restfully, wake energized, Zynergy.
